hotels.title: Wuhan Indulgence City Escape with Spa, Indoor Pool & Onsite Dining
hotels.description: Discover one of Chinaâ€™s most exciting technological precincts at Hyatt Regency Wuhan Optics Valley, effortlessly blending cutting-edge architectural design and lakeside views for a dazzling stay. This hotel is just moments from the city's vibrant shopping districts, where you can explore high-end boutiques and dine at world-class restaurants. After days exploring the nearby Botanical Gardens or Yellow Crane Tower, rejuvenate at the spa or in the indoor pool, or enjoy a session in the state-of-the-art fitness centre. Then, indulge in authentic Italian at Damiano or private dining at Fue Tue 1077.
